page.title: 04LOCAL TRANSPORT
page.content: Fifty years ago all goods arrived and left the village on the trains from Brafferton station. Before that everything came by boat up the river. But now everything comes and goes by road.There are all types of vehicles ,cars,buses,bikes,motorbikes,vans,truc ks carrying sheep and cows and farm machinery, tractors,trailers and combine harvesters. Only the school bus goes to Easingwold and Borough -bridge. You can go to Ripon on Saturday afternoons by coach. Each weekday Eddie Brown,who has a private bus company in the village, runs two buses to York. He also has coaches for outings and tours. Most of the young people have motorbikes so they can go to discoes or to work. The children ride bikes and BMXes. Some girls have ponies. Richard Myers.
